column4: i'm not seeing a repair option when i boot to the Lubuntu cd. Am i just not seeing it or should i boot a Ubuntu cd instead?
there is no real repair per say, the recovery is in the regular grub menu, not the live cd
oh i though you said boot to the cd? I'll try the ctrl/shift thing for grub
ok i hit shift to get the grub menu and picked recovery mode and picked shell prompt
